original_text: These things I have spoken unto you, that in me ye might have peace. In the world ye shall have tribulation: but be of good cheer; I have overcome the world.
korean_text: 이것을 너희에게 이르는 것은 너희로 내 안에서 평안을 누리게 하려 함이라 세상에서는 너희가 환난을 당하나 담대하라 내가 세상을 이기었노라

sentences.original_text: These things I have spoken unto you
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너희에게 이런 것들을 말한 것은

sentences.original_text: that in me ye might have peace
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 내 안에서 평안을 얻게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: In the world ye shall have tribulation
